resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108352</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108352</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202790</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Grandparent Interview</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Großeltern-Interview</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Entrevue de Grand-père</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Entrevista Do Grandparent</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Intervista Del Grandparent</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συνέντευξη παππούδων και γιαγιάδων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Entrevista del abuelo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will interview a grandparent and write a news article based upon their interview. They will also do research on historical events to develop questions to be asked during the interview.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer interviewen Großeltern und 
schreiben einen Nachrichten Artikel, der nach ihrem Interview 
gegründet wird. Sie tun auch Forschung auf historischen 
Fällen, um die während des Interviews gefragt zu werden Fragen zu 
entwickeln.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants intervieweront un grand-père et 
écriront un article de nouvelles basé sur leur entrevue. Ils 
feront également la recherche sur des événements historiques pour 
développer des questions à demander pendant l'entrevue.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes entrevistarão um grandparent e 
escreverão um artigo da notícia baseado em sua entrevista. 
Farão também a pesquisa sobre eventos históricos para 
desenvolver as perguntas a ser perguntadas durante a entrevista.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi intervisteranno un grandparent e 
scriveranno un articolo di notizie basato sulla loro intervista. 
Egualmente faranno la ricerca sugli eventi storici per 
sviluppare le domande da chiedere a durante l'intervista.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα πάρουν συνέντευξη από έναν παππού 
και γιαγιά και θα γράψουν ένα άρθρο ειδήσεων που βασίζεται στη 
συνέντευξή τους. Θα κάνουν επίσης την έρευνα για τα 
ιστορικά γεγονότα για να αναπτύξουν τις ερωτήσεις που 
υποβάλλονται κατά τη διάρκεια της συνέντευξης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes se entrevistarán con a abuelo
y escribirán un artículo de las noticias basado sobre su entrevista.
También harán la investigación sobre acontecimientos 
históricos para desarrollar las preguntas que se pedirán durante la 
entrevista.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>

        </lifeCycle>

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>

        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108352</entry>
